sdata.j: みんなもそうなのかな、と↑思↑↓おも↓うこ|とく|らいしかできない。
sdata.e: I can only wonder if this is the same for everyone else.

sdata.e: The second half of a man's life is made up of nothing but the habits he has acquired during the first half.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑全然↑↓ぜんぜん↓↑納得↑↓なっ|とく|↓していない。
